task.summary: Default task
Convert the project from a groovy library to scala one.
Add pattern operator ==~ and !=~ to String
Define methods of Files as implicit methods of Path
Add implicit conversion methods between FileTime and DateTime in java.time
Add Path extensions related to java stream methods in Files
Add samples of java stream related methods in Files
Add some methods of ScalaJdkPath, Scala version of GDK method extension.
Add line read/write method to Path and Add wrapper class to Input/OutputStream and Reader/Writer.
Change Set to Seq of FileAttributes in method signature in createXxxx() methods.
Add line read/write method to Path and Add wrapper class to Input/OutputStream and Reader/Writer.
Add content to README
Add FileTime conversion tests.
Add POSIX file permission conversion tests.
Add tests of GluinoIO related classes.
Add tests of stream closing in loan patterns.
Add tests for Reader#readLines etc.
Add tests for Reader#eachChar etc.
Add tests for AppendableConverter
Add tests for WriterWrapper.
Add ReaderWrapperLike and InputStreamLike trait.
Add WriterWrapperLike, PrintWriterLike and OutputStreamLike trait.
